title: Not even Nvidia’s 4090 Founders Edition is safe from melting
description: It's official -- Nvidia's own Founders Edition graphics cards aren't safe from the RTX 4090 melting problem.

title: You can burn calories while you game with the Cycledesk 100
description: There’s a desk, in front of which you can place an entire exercise bike. Gym bros around the world are surely rejoicing.
